name: 生態演化研究方法
description: This course is designed for beginning graduate students in the field of ecology and evolution. The aim is to provide training in developing an independent research project. In this class, you will be asked to write and present a research proposal as a part of the training. You will also be asked to actively participate in class discussion, and provide constructive feedback to other classmates' research questions, experiment design and overall justification of their proposed project.
goals: 提升研究生開展進行生態與演化領域研的基本能力
